content: easy pattern for a beginner takes about a skein of yarn and is scrap yarn friendly a great way to use up small bits of yarn from your stash the hat crochets quickly and is perfect for a rainy day or while watching tv the hat has a vertical rib design that results in a nice dense hat for warmth but also a super stretchy hat you can adjust the hat size as you crochet to make it as snug or loose as you like if you want it to be more of a slouchy hat that can also be done by lengthening the beginning row
